EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Oil and Gas Meeting Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Energy Industry Session at SpringOne Platform | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Energy Industry Session on September 25th at SpringOne Platform in Washington D.C.
If you haven’t already registered for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMImey9077y3AIVC1uGCh3ZYQ4cEAAYASAAEgIbQfD_BwE]]>, you’ll need to do so in order to attend this session. Please Register Now <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> and use my discount code, S1P200_BStavinoha, to save $200 off the pass price.
Date: Tuesday, September 25, 2018
Time:
10:30am-12:00pm
Location: Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center- Chesapeake 4 201 Waterfront St National Harbor, Maryland 20745 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Gaylord+National+Resort+%26+Convention+Center,+Oxon+Hill,+MD+20745/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b7b0734d793d5d:0x7fccb753cbe0c4f7?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwja-ufs_a3cAhURCTQIHQkzA9wQ8gEIRTAA]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Energy-Industry-Session-S1P.html]]>
